issues.title: Event: What is the definition?
issues.author: Dicky-Moe
issues.body:
Maybe I missed something, but I didn't find the definition of "event". I know there are different concepts; event in the sense of OLE Automation is different from event in the sense of SIP. There was a discussion somewhere, that only a change of state can be made into a SIP event.
I get the chance to promote SAFU :)
In SAFU, I understand an event as a yet another different thing: as fire-and-forget style.
